english.segment1: The universe is at Your feet. Gives You praise evermore. The stars will light the sky for You. Always, God be praised. And we sing. The Lord is on high. The Lord is on high
english.segment2: I adore You. I adore You. And there's none that compares. To Your majesty, oh Lord
english.segment3: I adore You. I adore You
english.segment4: And I stand. In the wonder of Your love
english.segment5: We will crown You. King forever. Living savior. Jesus redeemer
english.segment6: Lord of heaven. Robed in majesty. Crowned in glory. Creation adores You
english.segment7: Holy, holy. God almighty. And forever. The Lord is exalted
english.segment8: Hear the angels. Shout His anthem. Ever living. God we adore You
